item.description:
We are meeting at The Larches Inn around 6:45pm Saturday Jan 9th ~ if you are interested in carpooling please meet us there!!





KICK OFF THE NEW YEAR
With Dr. Bernie Siegel
Motivational, Inspirational, Caring, and Down-to-Earth
Saturday, January 9th 2010 8:00pm
www.healthylivingvideo.com/events


Dr. Bernie Siegel, MD is a medical doctor and author of the most famous books on living with and conquering disease. His book Love Medicine and Miracles has helped many realize the power to heal comes from the mind through will, determination, and love. Come to this inspiring evening with one the worlds most renowned mind body advocates.

Dr. Bernie Siegel, MD opens his heart and mind to give YOU expert advice on your personal questions about health and healing. Motivational, inspirational and down-to-earth, Bernie's approach is one of compassion, caring and love coupled with a wonderful sense of humor. He is one of the world's best known physicians, as well as a multibook best-selling author, motivational speaker and advocate for individuals who face the challenges of all chronic illness.

Space is limited ~ so reserve your tickets now!
Send 35.00 to Rain Phillips, 26 S Main St, Carver, MA 02330
item.name: Carpool scheduled for Bernie Siegel
